stories.text: Not a typical HN post,  but I am at a non-technical company and desperate to find someone who has done Google Analytics 360 & Salesforce Marketing Cloud integrations before. This is to help a client publish audiences created in Analytics 360 to Marketing Cloud, and use those audiences in their Salesforce email campaigns. Thank you
stories.title: Ask HN: Where to find a freelancer with GA 360/SFMC integration experience?
Germany Affirms Crypto Sold After One Year Is Tax-Free

stories.text: We are getting to a position where the entire business will choke on Excel. We are growing rapidly, large contracts coming in left and right. We deal with the government,so often Excel is all they know. What can I use for quick deployment, multi user access to make it a bit more manageable?
stories.title: How to Replace Excel?
